      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.opencv.core.Mat convertToAdaptiveBinary(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
      Converts the input matrix to an binary image using adaptive threshold, complements the image, then returns it.
      org.opencv.core.Mat convertToBinary(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
      Converts the input matrix to a binary image using Otsu threshold, erodes and dilates the image, then returns it.
      org.opencv.core.Mat drawContour(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
      Finds contours in the input matrix, draws the contours onto the original image grabbed from the camera and returns the matrix.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBinary()
      Returns an BufferedImage of the matrix dilate_dst.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBlood()
      Returns an BufferedImage of the matrix bloodBin.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getOrg()
      Returns an BufferedImage of the matrix org.
      double manAreaCheck()
      Grabs image from the camera, applies Otsu threshold to the input image, erodes and dilates the image and returns the area of the largest white blob in the image.
      double manBloodThreshold()
      Grabs the image taken by the manAreaCheck method applies an adaptive threshold to the input image, complements the image and returns the total area of all the white blobs.
      double manMaxGridCheck(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
      Finds the contours of the white blobs in a binary image and returns the area of the biggest blob.
      double manTotalGridCheck(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
      Finds the contours of the white blobs in a binary image and returns the total area of all the white blobs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManualMethods

        public ManualMethods(StorageBox storage,
                     Camera cam)

    • Method Detail

      • manAreaCheck

        public double manAreaCheck()
        Grabs image from the camera, applies Otsu threshold to the input image, erodes and dilates the image and returns the area of the largest white blob in the image. This is used to find the area of the fillet. This is used for manual control in the GUI.
        Returns:
        the area of the largest white blob in the image

      • manMaxGridCheck

        public double manMaxGridCheck(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Finds the contours of the white blobs in a binary image and returns the area of the biggest blob.
        Parameters:
        input - binary image
        Returns:
        area of the largest white blob in the input image.

      • manTotalGridCheck

        public double manTotalGridCheck(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Finds the contours of the white blobs in a binary image and returns the total area of all the white blobs.
        Parameters:
        input - binary image
        Returns:
        the total area of all the white blobs in the input image.

      • manBloodThreshold

        public double manBloodThreshold()
        Grabs the image taken by the manAreaCheck method applies an adaptive threshold to the input image, complements the image and returns the total area of all the white blobs. This is used to find the total area of the blood spots on the fillet. This is used for manual control in the GUI.
        Returns:
        the total area of all the white blobs in the image.

      • getOrg

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getOrg()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns an BufferedImage of the matrix org. This is the image grabbed from the camera.
        Returns:
        the original image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the conversion from Mat to BufferedImage fails.

      • getBinary

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBinary()
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns an BufferedImage of the matrix dilate_dst. This is the image grabbed from the camera, with contours drawn on the image to highlight the edges of the fillet.
        Returns:
        the original image with contours found in the dilated image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the conversion from Mat to BufferedImage fails.

      • getBlood

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBlood()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns an BufferedImage of the matrix bloodBin. This is the image captured by the camera, with contours drawn on the image to highlight the edges of the blood spots on the fillet.
        Returns:
        the original image with contours found in the bloodbin image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • convertToBinary

        public org.opencv.core.Mat convertToBinary(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Converts the input matrix to a binary image using Otsu threshold, erodes and dilates the image, then returns it.
        Parameters:
        input - image
        Returns:
        binary image of the input image.

      • convertToAdaptiveBinary

        public org.opencv.core.Mat convertToAdaptiveBinary(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Converts the input matrix to an binary image using adaptive threshold, complements the image, then returns it.
        Parameters:
        input - image
        Returns:
        binary image of the input image.

      • drawContour

        public org.opencv.core.Mat drawContour(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Finds contours in the input matrix, draws the contours onto the original image grabbed from the camera and returns the matrix.
        Parameters:
        input - binary image
        Returns:
        the original image with the contours found in the input image.
